name: minecraft-realms-map-node
description: Node.js Minecraft Realms backup downloader and map generator

scripts.generate:map: export IN_DIR=world; export OUT_DIR=output; export TEXTURE_PATH=~/code/minecraft-realms-map-node/jar/client.jar; bin/overviewer/overviewer.py --config=overviewer.cfg.py --processes=8
scripts.generate:poi: export IN_DIR=world; export OUT_DIR=output; export TEXTURE_PATH=~/code/minecraft-realms-map-node/jar/client.jar; bin/overviewer/overviewer.py --config=overviewer.cfg.py --processes=8  --genpoi

author: Michael Andrew (michael@uxvirtual.com)
